# rindeed

Scrape [indeed.com](www.indeed.com) search results.

### Examples

```{r}
library(rindeed)
ds <- in_scrape("data scientist", "United States")
da <- in_scrape("data analyst", "New York", 20)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(da)
```
